name: Faculty of Arts
description: The Faculty of Arts at CUHK offers a wide range of programs in humanities and social sciences, fostering critical thinking and cultural understanding.

name: Faculty of Business Administration
description: The Faculty of Business Administration provides world-class business education and research, preparing future leaders in commerce and management.

name: Faculty of Education
description: The Faculty of Education is dedicated to advancing educational theory and practice through innovative teaching and research.

name: Faculty of Engineering
description: The Faculty of Engineering at CUHK is at the forefront of technological innovation, offering cutting-edge programs in various engineering disciplines.

name: Faculty of Law
description: The Faculty of Law provides rigorous legal education and conducts impactful research on legal issues affecting Hong Kong and beyond.

name: Faculty of Medicine
description: The Faculty of Medicine is committed to excellence in medical education, research, and healthcare delivery.

name: Faculty of Science
description: The Faculty of Science offers comprehensive programs in natural sciences, mathematics, and statistics, promoting scientific discovery and innovation.

name: Faculty of Social Science
description: The Faculty of Social Science conducts research and teaching in various social science disciplines to understand and address societal challenges.
